name: refortify
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to fortify something (= make it stronger, especially in order to protect it) for a second, third, etc. time: The three castles were refortified in readiness for the advancing army. The attacking armies took so long that the nearby towns had time to re-fortify.
More examplesFewer examplesThe refortifying and strengthening of the empire's boundaries had just begun as part of his reform programme.In the 1930s, it was re-fortified into the world's most secure prison.
